name: Maple Bourbon Sweet Potato Pie
keywords: bourbon, maple syrup, sweet potato, dessert
recipeIngredient: 2 medium or 3 small sweet potatoes (about 1 1/2 pounds)
A few grinds of black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 425 degrees. With a fork, pierce sweet potatoes, and place on foil-lined baking sheet. Roast until soft, about 1 hour, turning once. Cool, peel, and put flesh through a food mill, or mash smoothly with a potato masher to make 2 cups of puree.
Reduce heat to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk puree and remaining ingredients to combine. Pour into prepared crust.

Place pie plate onto a cookie sheet, and bake until filling is just about set, or when a knife inserted one inch from the edge comes out clean, 45 to 50 minutes. Cool pie on wire rack to room temperature.
